text: Turns the display flag of the Hair Generate object on and off.
This tool toggles the display of any generated hair that is selected or that is referencing a current or selected node. This also works when you are inside a referenced node.
Turning off the display of the
object disables hair generation in the viewport, and is useful for speeding up manipulation or simulation of guides.

title: Toggle Hair Display
summary: Turns the display flag of the Hair Generate object on and off.
